modules.title: Introduction to React
learning_objectives: Understand what React is
Learn about the benefits of using React

modules.title: Setting Up the Development Environment
learning_objectives: Install Node.js and npm
Set up a new React project using Create React App

modules.title: Understanding JSX
learning_objectives: Learn what JSX is
Write simple JSX code

modules.title: Components and Props
learning_objectives: Understand the concept of components
Learn how to pass data using props

modules.title: State and Lifecycle
learning_objectives: Learn about state in React
Understand component lifecycle methods

modules.title: Handling Events
learning_objectives: Learn how to handle events in React
Create interactive components

modules.title: Conditional Rendering
learning_objectives: Understand how to render components conditionally
Implement conditional logic in JSX

modules.title: Lists and Keys
learning_objectives: Learn how to render lists of data
Understand the importance of keys in lists

modules.title: Forms in React
learning_objectives: Understand controlled components
Handle form submissions

modules.title: Lifting State Up
learning_objectives: Learn how to lift state up to a common ancestor
Share state between components

modules.title: React Router Basics
learning_objectives: Understand the purpose of React Router
Implement basic routing in a React app

modules.title: Introduction to Hooks
learning_objectives: Learn what hooks are
Use the useState and useEffect hooks

modules.title: Building a Simple React App
learning_objectives: Combine all learned concepts to build a simple app
Deploy the app to a hosting service
